item.title: [Delta] Yell On/Off
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Hey, so on my Delta I was trying to make a command that turns my yell system on and off.

Here’s my yell command, I don’t know if it’s needed.

[code=yell command]if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
				titles = "[Player]-";
			}
			else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mista pnut")){
			titles = "[The Boss]- ";
			}
			else if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator]- ";
            }
            else if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin]- ";
            }
            else if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner]- ";
            }
			else if (playerRights == 4) {
				titles = "[Player]- ";
			}
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Mod/Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin/Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner/Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Super Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner/Super Donator]- ";
            }
			else if (donator == 2){
				titles = "[Super Donator]- ";
			}
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}[/code]

Read full topic
